subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] franks box
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-73068410-1179075947=:80434
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Franks on hiatus so I will try to answer that. No he doesnt believe only 30 can operate it however he also cant build every box for every person who wants one. Frank thinks the sweep tuning method can be used by anyone and I tried it just to prove that theory right/wrong. Works great for me!
   
  As for edison well thats a tricky subject. Tho I get "claims" of fame I never believe simply on face value. I document it and I move on. I think the box is like the sweep method in so many ways,  and Frank thinks perhaps it works better than the random tuning so he is incororating it into the box future prototypes. He wishes everyone would try it out a few times just to see what they can get. It doesnt take anything fancy just you, two fingers, and a radio with a knob/tuning dial while u record.
   
  instructions are on my website even tho some parts of it are under construction or not working yet you can get to the info by clickin on techniques.
   
  http://misty.xm.com
   
  Misty

Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
          Just to intercept before Frank goes into orbit <G>: The 30 people 
thing appears to be what Chris claims, but Frank does not subscribe 
to it. Frank was interesting in producing the boxes, but apparently 
was derailed in some part by Chris. I'm repeating what he has said 
here and Frank will tell you if I am incorrect. I don't know where 
the box thing stands right now, except that I am also in the queue 
myself, so take a number! ;)

As far as Edison goes--I think his name has been popping up enough on 
recording made by various folks here that there may be something to 
thought that he is playing a role in this communication. However, no 
one I know has heard this statement by him that Chris claims to have 
gotten.

Ann

On May 13, 2007, at 10:45 AM, bhali333 wrote:

> hi I am new to this group and have just recently been introduced to
> franks box. I have been a PI and researcher for many years and am very
> interested in this technology. I have heard a demonstration of the box
> by chris moon and he has stated that a message recieved by him from
> thomas edison has informed him that only 30 people on earth will be
> able to operate this box succesfully. Can anyone tell me if this is
> true or can anyone attempt research with franks box and be sucessfull?
> And if so how can I go about obtaining one?
> any help is appreciated.
>
> bruce halliday P.I.T. paranormal investigating team of south new 
> jersey.
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
